website_summaries.verdict: Decorative, but sturdy enough to be used to help kids relax and refocus, especially when transitioning to other activities.
pros: Can be used as a supplemental teaching tool to help children focus and relax by counting as bubbles float down
Easy for kids and even toddlers to carry
cons: No choice of colors when ordering
May be too small for some users

customer_reviews.title: I love these
customer_reviews.text: I'm Irving's daughter, reviewing this product. I absolutely love these. Been careful to store them in their original boxes, to avoid scratching or dropping. Each timer is its own little universe. The motion of the drips is soothing because it's predictable and pretty evenly-paced, and I get to decide when to turn it over. The color combinations are also very calming, and as far as I know, this pack always comes with the blue-green timer, and the pink-blue timer. :)
customer_reviews.author: Irving Drew

customer_reviews.title: Good toys. Poor timers.
customer_reviews.text: My students enjoy watching the colored bubbles move downward. I wish they were actual timers, but as toys they're really good. My students investigated the timers for a good 30 minutes to figure out why the colors didn't mix before realizing the two halves are separate. I couldn't have been prouder of their ability to focus and use their senses!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids with autism
customer_reviews.text: Soothing to look at. Useful during timeout when my aspergers son gets frustrated with schoolwork. Got the green one, and it's too light to see well. Pink and purple is better.
customer_reviews.author: homesschooler

customer_reviews.title: Talking Stick.
customer_reviews.text: very fun to play with and helps me concentrate on other things I'm doing. We are using it like a 'talking stick' and passing it back and forth to share talking time and not interrupt each other.
customer_reviews.author: Retired software tester

customer_reviews.title: Beware of Leaking
customer_reviews.text: These are great line entertainment in long lines and Disney but one of them ended up leaking all over my sons hands. Freaked us out a little bit because we had no idea what the chemicals inside were.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer B.

customer_reviews.title: Cute. Fun. Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: My 7 and 3 year old received these in their stockings after someone on Pinterest suggested them. They were not interested at all, but! Along came a tiny sister who LOVES it. She’s two and loves watching it right before falling asleep.
customer_reviews.author: gentry scott

customer_reviews.title: These are great, until they break
customer_reviews.text: These are great, until they break! They have a very strong oder when they start leaking. My son dropped it on the sidewalk and I didn't realize it was broken right away. We have gone through 3 of them, won't buy again as they just don't seem durable.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Stranak

customer_reviews.title: Does Not Work - Very Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to use this product in my classroom. My first order arrived and they didn't work properly. The fluid dripped through for maybe 5 seconds or less. I figured it was just a bad pair. So I replaced them. But very disappointed when the second set came in and the same thing happened - no drip!! I'm returning for full refund!! Not sure how it gets past quality control!
customer_reviews.author: Norm Lemay

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: The product does not even work that well. There is air in both of the items are received. They were stocking stuff first this Christmas and extremely disappointing. Waste of money
customer_reviews.author: KipKip

customer_reviews.title: these are to small and the little motion drops are ...
customer_reviews.text: these are to small and the little motion drops are not very colorful. These little things were not worth the money. If i had seen them before ordering them I would not have bought them. They should sell 2 for .50 cents.
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: A little disappointing.
customer_reviews.text: Not quite what I expected. Bought for my grandson. He used for a short while but tired of them quickly. They don't "do" enough. OT expensive. It wished I had bought something with a little more to it.
customer_reviews.author: comconct

customer_reviews.title: Cool even if you don't use it as a Timer.
customer_reviews.text: Just a cool toy. Its quite a bit slower than you'd think, but Its a keeper.
customer_reviews.author: FULLTIMEBOSS

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality. Pass on this.
customer_reviews.text: They barely work at all. Super disappointing. You need to shake it a ton and keep readjusting to make the oil move through. I’m looking for something that does not require messing with during a meditation moment.
customer_reviews.author: Clarapatra

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: My kids both like these but the pink and blue one is defective or something. The blue will not drip through leaving the pink all alone at the bottom while the blue is at the top.
customer_reviews.author: James Charles

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These were fun stocking stuffers for Christmas, and they are colorful, and entertaining, just as described!
customer_reviews.author: GrapeslayerTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Very soothing...even for me!
customer_reviews.text: My son LOVES these. They are very calming to him, and we also use them to "time" him when he's brushing his teeth.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: I tried these out and they are great to hold a childs attention for a while
customer_reviews.text: I tried these out and they are great to hold a childs attention for a while! I am giving these out as little gifts at a party.

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up!
customer_reviews.text: Colors not as bold as a different one I bought, but still delightfully mesmerizing!

customer_reviews.title: Just as described; good deal.
customer_reviews.text: Got these for gift-giving, and the kids loved them. Good quality, and came exactly as pictured. Would recommend!

customer_reviews.title: Perfect redirection tool

customer_reviews.title: which isn't as nice. Just okay
customer_reviews.text: Very, very small and the green/blue one just looks green. Both drip very fast, too, which isn't as nice. Just okay.
customer_reviews.author: Sheri

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: My students love these, but one of them started leaking after a week or so... we had to throw it away.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: It's very pretty. Arrived promptly
customer_reviews.text: Very calming stim toy. The oil travels between a flattened section in the acrylic, which keeps it translucent. It's very pretty. Arrived promptly.

customer_reviews.title: Mesmerising
customer_reviews.text: The colors are bright, but we have kept it out of the sun so I don't know if that would affect it. My 7 year old likes them.
customer_reviews.author: J. LietzTop Contributor: Knitting

customer_reviews.title: These don’t work!
customer_reviews.text: These water timers don’t work! The colored substance is supposed to trickle down like a timer but it doesn’t. It is like it is stuck at both ends!
customer_reviews.author: Debby U.

customer_reviews.title: Great stocking stuffer.
customer_reviews.text: Huge hit as stocking stuffers for xmas. My office loved them. One of them leaked after my 1 year old repeatedly threw it. Not bad. Otherwise they all came with one of each color per 2-pack.

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty mediocre. The liquid really doesn’t move very easily.

customer_reviews.text: Mesmerizing bubbler. My daughters loved these for Christmas. One daughter is taking it to her dorm room and the other is enjoying it, in her room, at home.

customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old loves the way the two colors blend together and then separate. I do wish it took longer to complete.

customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my students to use to calm themselves, extend a seated activity or as a quiet activity during nap time. I love them!

customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for an autistic child, he absolutely loves them and I'd recommend for anyone! Very fun to watch.

customer_reviews.title: Did not work
customer_reviews.text: The colored oil did not budge, and I monitored this thing for long enough to drive me crazy. Terrible choice.

customer_reviews.title: This little trinket is calming and cool!
customer_reviews.text: A lovely gift for my friends who work in offices as well as friends who are students. This little trinket is calming and cool!

customer_reviews.title: Cool timer

customer_reviews.title: Broken and had leaked out
customer_reviews.text: Broken and had leaked out, still would be cool if it worked right, not worth returning broken, but likely not going to buy another

customer_reviews.title: Good for watching but clumpy.
customer_reviews.text: I found that the timer was still fun to watch but mine had some clumps in it that prevented the liquid from successfully moving through the timer. They both had clumps but the green and blue one was much larger that the pink and blue. It all looks fine until the end when the clumps start to show.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are really great! Got them as a calming tool for my six year old. Mesmerizing!!

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great for my child with autism. He likes watching. Not the best as a timer but that is not what we use it for anyway.

customer_reviews.title: Decent Bubbler
customer_reviews.text: They don't last very long, only for 20 seconds or so. Hoping they would last longer to be used more for "time out". I wouldn't quite use this as a "timer"

customer_reviews.title: I am so excited Happy Holidays: )

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.

customer_reviews.text: Since it is a set of two, I could tell that one of them doesn't work as it should- a small (annoying, anxiety inducing) amount of blue stays at the top and doesn't drip down! Defeats the purpose!

customer_reviews.title: No Good!
customer_reviews.text: TERRIBLE! Purchased two, the oil doesn't drip thru unless it is constantly shaken. Actually more stressed now.

customer_reviews.title: One piece worked perfectly. The liquid in the other ...
customer_reviews.text: One piece worked perfectly. The liquid in the other one "poured" rather than "bubbled." I returned them and ordered a different product.

customer_reviews.title: Good for all ages😀😀

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensory box
customer_reviews.text: I'm a nurse who works very closely with patients with autism. They love these! I've bought multiple.
customer_reviews.author: sarah langham

customer_reviews.title: They love them! It calms them down
customer_reviews.text: I work at my moms preschool so I decided to get the liquid motion for the kids. They love them! It calms them down . I was afraid that they would brake but in my surprise they are very sturdy. The kids have dropped several times leaving no scratch or crack. I am definitely going to be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: alana  acosta

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: They already broke in my classroom. It's been about two months.
customer_reviews.author: Nina Morelli

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality, didn't like.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't like these and returned them. They were way too thin for my liking. Secondly, the drops didn't just drop nicely one after another, but they created a huge puddle on the bottom before they sunk down completely. The green blue was more like extremely pale yellow / green and was almost invisible. Timer was about 35 seconds per bubbler.
customer_reviews.author: Indigo Skye

customer_reviews.title: Definately not kid proofed
customer_reviews.text: I loved this item as it was very soothing for my anxiety and sensory issues; but after dropping the blue and green one (the same day it arrived) on my wood floor one time it broke and started leaking. And to add the icing on the very crumby cake due to my chemical sensitivity I had an allergic reaction to the oily liquid inside. So all in all great concept just wish it was sturdier.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Fitzgerald

customer_reviews.title: Calming While Working
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased for a child (9yoa) who says she loves it. More importantly her mom indicates that she holds it while working her school efforts and it seems to have a calming effect on her, which allows her to focus better.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Anne

customer_reviews.title: A Disappointing Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I only gave this item one star because I had to in order to write the review. I bought these timers for my 2nd grade classroom to be used in our mindfulness spot. They both broke and started leaking within the first week I had them in the classroom. One of them broke when a child dropped it on the tile floor. These timers are not durable and I would not recommend them for use with children.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Hopkins

customer_reviews.title: They provide moments of distraction at work. The actual ...
customer_reviews.text: They provide moments of distraction at work. The actual color quality was a little disappointing but overall this product serves its purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Z
